sentences.sentence: You'll be able to win prizes galore.
There will be games and prizes galore.
Jupiter in Taurus is bringing opportunity galore, and your only problem is likely to be to pick and choose among the best offers others present.
sentences.translation: 金牛宫的木星正给你带来数不清的机会，唯一的问题很可能是去选出这其中最好的一个。
